knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(wbstats)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(scales)
library(tidyr)
setwd(getwd())

# List of iso3 country codes
need <- c("SSD", "SYR", "VEN")

# GDP Growth Rate
gdp_growth_data <- wb(country = need, indicator = "NY.GDP.MKTP.KD.ZG", startdate = 2000, enddate = 2020)
```

```{r}
ggplot(gdp_growth_data, aes(x = as.factor(date), y = value, color = country)) +
  geom_line(aes(group = 1)) + geom_point() + facet_grid(rows = vars(country)) +
  labs(title = "GDP Growth Rate",
       subtitle = "growth rate changes in last 20 years", parse = TRUE) +
  xlab(NULL) + ylab(NULL)
```
